## Government Tender Notice: K0A70-220330-RFP for Soft Body Armor Vests

## Tender Reference Number
WS3836953098-Doc3851580537

## Solicitation Number
WS3836953098

## Classification
This is a Competitive Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Government of Canada's procurement process.

## Category
Goods and Services (G&SD)

## Notice Type
Request for Proposal

## Description
Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) invites suppliers to submit a proposal for the provision of Soft Body Armor Vests to support the agency's operational needs.

## Scope of Work
The contract will be for a period of 5 years, with an estimated usage of:

* 85 units per year for Years 1-3
* 100 units per year for Years 4 and 5 (if extended)

The contractor will be required to provide the vests on an "AS & WHEN" requested basis, with a maximum delivery period of 3 years from the date of contract award.

## Delivery Location
The delivery location will be the Department of National Defence's (DND) facilities, with a primary delivery point at the National Capital Region (NCR).

## Eligibility
All interested suppliers must be able to demonstrate that they meet the requirements outlined in the tender notice.

## Tender Submission
The tender submission deadline for this RFP is April 5, 2023, at 14:00ET. Late submissions will be considered non-responsive.

## Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price.

## Contract Extension
The contractor grants the option to extend the contract by up to two (2) additional years, on the same terms and conditions as the initial contract.

## Contact Information
For further information, please contact: Catherine Dore at [catherine.dore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:catherine.dore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
